To start using the app, you need to add your Napier account. To start, click the \"Manage account\" button in the main menu.
Enter your Napier email and password and click \"Save\".
To scan a check-in code, click the \"Scan code\" button in the main menu.
If the app asks for camera permission, select \"While using the app\."
Point the camera at the code. The app will automatically scan the code and display it on the bottom part of the screen.
If the app picks up a wrong code, click the scanner reset button.
To check-in with the displayed code, click the \"Confirm\" button.
On first check-in, the app will navigate to Microsoft login screen and log in automatically. When requested, enter the 2FA code in your authenticator app.
After login, the app will navigate to the check in menu of the Napier website. Select the event you want to check in to and click the \"Check in\" button.
The app will automatically enter the code and finish the check in.
